name: Ground Switch
description:
This project was made for the 2021 bear Jams Fall,

I'm a remote young creator, 13

Wanted to Have fun over the weekend by testing my abilities to make a game.

And by testing my abilities I mean making my first real game.

For me, it took a lot of tutorials to solve problems however this whole event was a lot of fun,

Credits:

Music/Sounds,

Game music, Speed Fever by Truvio

Main menu music, Super Mario World Title Screen

I used SFXR to create the Jump Sound

Mario Death Sound

Art, All art was made by yours truly, I know right SQUARE but with rounded corners.    Hope you Enjoy the game : )
